summary: This bill, the Congressional Award Program Reauthorization Act, reauthorizes the Congressional Award Act. It extends the program's authorization, amending Section 108 of the original act by changing the termination date from October 1, 2023, to October 1, 2028. This amendment is retroactive to October 1, 2023. Additionally, the bill makes minor revisions to Section 102 of the act concerning medal descriptions.
